statements: SELECT * FROM compliance_records;
SELECT record_id, compliance_status FROM compliance_records ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending';
SELECT hydropower_project_id, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM compliance_records;
SELECT record_id, compliance_status, environmental_impact FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE hydropower_project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT record_id, compliance_status, date FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant' AND date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT record_id, compliance_status FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status LIKE 'Compliant%' ORDER BY compliance_status;
SELECT hydropower_project_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM compliance_records GROUP BY hydropower_project_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE record_id=1;
SELECT record_id, record_date, compliance_status FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status='Pending' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT impact_description, impact_date FROM environmental_impact WHERE hydropower_operation_id=2 ORDER BY impact_date ASC;
SELECT record_id, compliance_status FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status='Completed';
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact WHERE impact_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = 'pending';
SELECT record_id, record_date FROM compliance_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT impact_id, impact_description FROM environmental_impact WHERE impact_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY impact_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records INNER JOIN environmental_impact ON compliance_records.hydropower_operation_id = environmental_impact.hydropower_operation_id;
SELECT compliance_status, COUNT(*) FROM compliance_records GROUP BY compliance_status HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryComplianceRecords;
SELECT record_id, record_date, is_compliant FROM RegulatoryComplianceRecords ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT record_id, record_description FROM RegulatoryComplianceRecords WHERE is_compliant = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM HydropowerOperation WHERE operation_capacity > 100;
SELECT impact_id, impact_type, impact_level FROM EnvironmentalImpact ORDER BY impact_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryComplianceRecords WHERE is_compliant = TRUE;
SELECT record_date, record_description FROM RegulatoryComplianceRecords ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM HydropowerOperation WHERE operation_capacity > 1000 ORDER BY operation_capacity DESC;
SELECT operation_name, operation_type, operation_capacity FROM HydropowerOperation WHERE operation_type = 'Dams';
SELECT impact_type, impact_description FROM EnvironmentalImpact WHERE impact_level = 'High' ORDER BY impact_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE regulatory_status='Approved';
SELECT record_date, record_description FROM compliance_records WHERE is_completed = TRUE;
SELECT COUNT(record_id) AS total_records FROM compliance_records WHERE regulatory_status='Pending';
SELECT operation_name, operation_location, operation_capacity FROM hydropower_operations WHERE operation_status='Active';
SELECT agency_name, agency_location, agency_contact FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE agency_location='USA';
SELECT * FROM compliance_records ORDER BY record_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT record_description, regulatory_status FROM compliance_records WHERE is_completed = true;
SELECT impact_type, impact_severity FROM environmental_impact WHERE impact_severity > 3 ORDER BY impact_date LIMIT 5;
SELECT operation_name, operation_capacity, operation_status FROM hydropower_operations WHERE operation_capacity >= 5000 ORDER BY operation_capacity DESC;
SELECT agency_name, agency_location, agency_website FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE agency_location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY agency_name;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT record_id, description, regulatory_entity FROM regulatory_compliance_records WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT impact_type, mitigation_cost FROM environmental_impact WHERE impact_type = 'Water Pollution';
SELECT * FROM hydropower_operations WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT entity_name, contact_person FROM regulatory_entities WHERE entity_type = 'Government';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT record_id, date, regulatory_entity FROM regulatory_compliance_records WHERE regulatory_entity = 'EPA' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT description, regulatory_entity FROM regulatory_compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = FALSE AND regulatory_entity = 'FDA' ORDER BY record_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM hydropower_operations WHERE operation_type = 'Maintenance' ORDER BY operation_date ASC, capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact WHERE impact_type = 'Water Pollution' AND mitigation_cost > 5000 ORDER BY impact_id DESC;
